name: PotentialTD
description:
WASD = Move Camera

LMB = Place Farm

RMB = Place MushTree

ALT + F4 = Exit

This is a buggy horrible  and feature lacking prototype.

The inintial idea was an RTS  TD game that simulates while you just handle the general priorities and buildings management.

I will definitely continue working on it, it was fun to make so far, plus its my first time doing something that uses in game the tile system. and yes it took me a long time to figure out how to do that...

follow for future update notifications, I promise that you won't regret it.
